name: Lynx Core Yellow
description:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Carrying Capacity: 8K µSCU
Temp. Rating: -31 / 61 °C
Backpack Compatibility: Light
Maintain your mobility with the Lynx combat armor. A high tech polymer weave allows the wearer to withstand enough damage to quickly escape danger. The suit's striking look became famous after being worn by the Seeker in the widely popular "Fire and Fury" vids of the mid-2800s.
description_cn:
物品类型：轻型护甲
减少伤害：20%
储物空间：8K µSCU
适用温度：-31 / 61 °C
可挂载背包类型：轻型
使用猞猁战斗护甲保持您的机动性。高科技聚合物编织物使佩戴者能够承受足够的伤害以迅速摆脱危险。这套西装的醒目的外观是在29世纪中期由猎人穿着的广受欢迎的“火与怒”影片中扬名的。

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-耶拉(Yela)-六角湾(Grim HEX)-Skutters_GrimHex
